get.description: Retrieve a list of all detail pesanan

200.description: List of detail pesanan retrieved successfully

post.description: Store a new detail pesanan in the database

get.description: Retrieve a single detail pesanan by its ID

put.description: Update jumlah atau subtotal dari detail pesanan berdasarkan ID

delete.description: Hapus data detail pesanan berdasarkan ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of book categories

post.description: Store a new kategori into the database

get.description: Retrieve a single kategori by ID

delete.description: Remove a kategori from the system
